body:
Hi, Mostapha
this plugin is really useful and interesting....but i was wondering how can i download the honeybee components which you've used in the tutorials??
Thanks in Advance :)
topic: how can i get the honey-bee??

replies.body:
Hi Yahya,

Honeybee is still not released. Mustapha just made some previews of this great tool. He said it would be completed in the next couple of months.
